reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater comfortable, soft, and warm, with one mentioning it's perfect for spring weather. They appreciate its fit, with one noting the sleeves are a great length, and like its appearance, quality, and color, particularly the rich brown shade. The sizing receives mixed feedback, with some finding it true to size while others say it runs very large.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warm, cozy, thick. A rare find.
items.body: Once in a while, an actual thick and soft sweater comes along that you wish you had owned sooner. I actually love this material. It’s warm. The only complaints that I have are that I prefer a classic shoulder/sleeve cut and not the raglan sleeve style, but it’s not awful, certainly not like the current drop sleeves that flatter very few. (I hope someday the drop sleeve trend is seen like shoulder pads now are.) My other complaint is that I do wish it was a little longer and that’s coming from a short waisted woman. Sleeves are a great length though and that’s coming from a tall woman. But the length works well for most outfits I wanted them for, like with skirts. It’s certainly not cropped, but definitely the shortest sweater I own. I will hang to dry and stretch a bit. They are true to size, but I also got one that I sized up for a comfortable one to wear with jeans. These are warm and soft. I hope they stay that way. I’ve never actually felt a sweater quite like this that still had some style. If they made this fabric material into a different style sweater with longer length and classic cut sleeves, like the Amazon Essential cable knit cotton fisherman style sweaters, I’d buy those too. A nice reddish burgundy or a pink dark blush would be a great addition to the colors. Read more
items.author: Dear John,

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars My New Favorite
items.body: I really love the look and feel of this sweater. It’s soft and comfy with a beautiful design. The cut is flattering as it hides bulges and the sweater doesn’t cling to you. I purchased two in lovely colors. I will definitely check out this sweater next year for new colors. I would love to see this in corn flower blue (medium blue), baby blue, forest green (medium green), mint green, pea green (yellow green), and dark red. I would buy all of these! Thank you! Read more
items.author: L

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater so far, color a bit brighter than expected
items.body: So warm and cozy. Glad I sized up for a looser fit (5'5", 155#, usual a large, but ordered xl). The price was great ($12), but the picture and description made it seem like heathered pink was a little more muted. It is pretty bright! I haven't washed it yet, but I do expect it to shrink a bit (another reason I sized up). It is a thick and soft sweater, and feels like great quality. We'll see how it goes as I wash and wear a few times. Read more
items.author: brancibird

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful
items.body: Beautiful sweater. Color is very vibrant (fluorescent green/yellow), yarn is soft, thick and warm. Doesn't pill easily and washes well--I lay flat to dry or hang from the hem on a clip hanger, Read more
items.author: shoecrazy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A nice, pretty cable sweater
items.body: This sweater is really soft and great, especially for the price I got it for. I'm quite pleased. The size seems true for me. I will be gently with it when washing so hopefully it will last for a while. It will probably pill a little, but what sweater doesn't these days. The color (gray) is great as well. Read more
items.author: Suzie_tree

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Heavy thick sweater.
items.body: This sweater material is very thick making it feel bulky and stiff. I had hoped for a more relaxed fit. It was very inexpensive so I will donate rather than return it. Read more
items.author: farm folk

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect sweater!
items.body: So comfy, soft and perfect warmth! Of all the sweaters I own, this one has the look/feel of wool with the most silliness and 0 itch. Read more
items.author: sunshine_coffee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars You'll love it
items.body: Best sweater you'll ever wear. Love the long sleeves. Very comfortable Read more
items.author: Christina Hendrickson

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Navy, Eggshell White, Light Grey Heather, Pastel Lilac, Lime Green, Espresso, Black, Bright Peach Heather. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
